loginPage.title: MI AMUKELIWA NAKAMBE!
loginPage.subtitle: Hi kombela mi nghenisa vuxokoxoko bya n'wina ku nghena.
loginPage.emailPlaceholder: Nghenisa adirese ya n'wina ya imeyili
loginPage.errorTokenMissing: Mi nghenile hi ndzundzo, kambe ku hava thokeni leyi amukeriweke. Hi kombela mi tihlanganisa na mpfuno.
loginPage.errorDefault: Ku nghena ku tsandzekile. Hi kombela mi kambisisa vuxokoxoko bya n'wina.
loginPage.errorUnexpectedFormat: Xihoxo xa ku nghena (xiyimo {{status}}). Xivumbeko xa xihoxo lexi nga languteriwangiki.
loginPage.errorWithStatus: Ku nghena ku tsandzekile (xiyimo {{status}}). Hi kombela mi ringeta nakambe.
loginPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Ku ve na xihoxo xa netiweke lexi nga tivekiki. Hi kombela mi ringeta nakambe.

registrationPage.title: SUNGULA SWESWI
registrationPage.subtitle: Endla akhawunti ya wena ya Mavito.
registrationPage.firstNamePlaceholder: Nghenisa vito ra wena ro sungula
registrationPage.emailPlaceholder: Nghenisa adirese ya wena ya imeyili
registrationPage.errorAgreeToTerms: U fanele ku pfumela eka milawu na swipimelo.
registrationPage.alertSuccess: U tsarisile hi ndzundzo! Hi kombela u ya emahlweni u nghena.
registrationPage.errorDefault: Ku tsarisa ku tsandzekile. Hi kombela u ringeta nakambe.
registrationPage.errorWithStatus: Ku tsarisa ku tsandzekile (xiyimo {{status}}). Hi kombela u ringeta nakambe.
registrationPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Ku ve na xihoxo xa netiweke lexi nga tivekiki. Hi kombela u ringeta nakambe.

userTypeLabels.applyingLinguist: Ku tsarisa tanihi Mutivi wa Ririmi

dashboard.searchDescription: Lavisisa marito hi tindzimi to tala
dashboard.downloadDescription: Kuma na ku koka switirhisiwa swa marito
dashboard.contributeDescription: Engetela marito mantshwa eka databeyisi ya hina
